values: 打；击中；击打；撞击；攻击；冲击；按；访问（网站）；（灾难、疾病等）侵袭；袭击；（尤指商业或娱乐产品）大受欢迎；走红；（尤指毒品）产生效果；产生不良影响；（尤指在感情上）伤害；使痛苦；使突然想起
击中；命中；打；热门歌曲；流行音乐唱片；热门影视作品；很受欢迎的人（或者物）；撞击声；（体育运动中的）有效打击

synonym.mean: 打击；袭击；碰撞；偶然发现；伤…的感情

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，多指急速或突然一次猛击。
普通用词，含义广泛，指连续打击。游戏、竞赛或战争中作打败解。
普通用词，常与strike换用，侧重有目标的猛击，强调用力击中。
侧重指用棍子或鞭子等痛打。

word_group.brief_definition: 着地；撞击地面；[美国俚语]倒塌
受到冲击, 遭到破坏；受到严重影响
(要某人开始做某事, 如演奏音乐)开始吧
突然意外赚大钱(或赢大钱), 发大财
说到点子上, 正中要害
word_group.phrase: hit the nail on the head

word_group.brief_definition: 迅速而顺利地投入某事；一炮打响；一举成功
发挥正当作用, 适得其用, 恰到好处
发现；想到；调情；挑逗；企图得到
发现；想到；调情；挑逗；企图得到

bilingual.source: "Oh no!" said the boy as the wave hit.
As Lily was walking past, the ball hit her!
bilingual.target: 莉莉走过时，球打到了她！

bilingual.source: To pull him away from the cooker, she hit his arm with a piece of wood.
bilingual.target: 为了把他从炉子旁拉开，她用木头打了他的手臂。

bilingual.source: I opened the door, fell on the floor and hit my head.
bilingual.target: 我打开门，摔倒在地上，撞到了头。

bilingual.source: The truth hit her hard and she could not help but cry.
bilingual.target: 事情的真相对她打击很大，她忍不住哭了起来。

bilingual.source: He hit a home run with the club.
bilingual.target: 他用球棒打了一个本垒打。

bilingual.source: He hit the ball deep into the outfield.
bilingual.target: 他把球打到了外野的深处。

bilingual.source: He swung the bat and hit a home run.
bilingual.target: 他挥动球棒击出了一个本垒打。

bilingual.source: He shot the ball and it hit the backboard.
bilingual.target: 他投篮时球打在篮板上。

list.abstract: 哈尔滨工业大学（Harbin Institute of Technology，简称哈工大），是隶属于工业和信息化部的全国重点大学，是国家“985工程”“211工程”“双一流”建设高校，入选全国首批十所党建工作示范高校。学校位于哈尔滨市，现任党委书记陈杰，校长韩杰才。校训为“规格严格，功夫到家”。 哈尔滨工业大学前身为创建于1920年的哈尔滨中俄工业学校。1922年改名中俄工业大学校。1928年2月改名为东省特区工业大学校。1928年10月正式定名为哈尔滨工业大学。1936年改名为国立哈尔滨高等工业学校。1938年改名为国立哈尔滨工业大学。1970年与黑龙江工学院、哈尔滨电工学院合并组成新的哈尔滨工业大学。2000年，再次与哈尔滨建筑大学合并组建新的哈尔滨工业大学。 截至2023年12月 ，学校有哈尔滨，威海、深圳3个校区，校园面积565.42万平方米， 校舍建筑面积 354.20万平方米，121个本科专业。截至2023年3月，国家重点学科一级学科9个，6个国家重点学科二级学科，博士学位授权一级学科31个，硕士学位授权一级学科41个，博士后科研流动站24个， 国家一流学科8个， 省级一流学科28个，国家工程实验室、研究中心共9个，国家级协同创新中心1个，教职工7173人。以工科为优势和特色，被誉为“工程师的摇篮”。 哈尔滨工业大学在软科2024年软科中国大学排名中，位列16名，2024年QS世界大学排名中位列第256名。
HIT（Heterojunction with intrinsic Thinlayer）是指采用HIT结构的硅太阳能电池，转换效率达到23%，开路电压729mV。

yingyinNormal.en: We hit him from all four sides. Hit him hard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们从四面发动进攻，狠狠地打。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean so it doesn't hit the fan?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说不要打中风扇?[酿成大祸]？

yingyinNormal.en: He has sex, and we get hit in our heads.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他做爱了，我们却要挨打。

yingyinNormal.en: Get out. I couldn't stop if a meteor hit me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 少来了，我就算被陨石打中也停不下来。

yingyinNormal.en: Give me the bag. Give me the bag. No, hit me. hit me. Give me the bag. I'm not kidding. Hit me. No. Hit me. Hit me. Hit me!
yingyinNormal.zh: 把那个袋子给我，把袋子给我 。不，打我，打我。给我袋子，给我袋子。打我。不，打我，打我，打我！

yingyinNormal.en: Justin Bieber got a hit and run, Chris Brown got a hit and run, Rihanna got hit and still didn't run.
yingyinNormal.zh: 贾斯汀·比伯和克里斯·布朗肇事逃逸了，但蕾哈娜被打了却没有跑。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I don't want to hit you. Oh what then? Kick me? No. Bite me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我不想打你。什么？你要踢我？不咬我？

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. Look, I understand if you came by to hit me, I deserve it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你是来打我的，我了解，这是我活该。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. What about the time I hit you in the face with Sylvian's pumpkin?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，那我用薇恩的南瓜打你脸那一次呢？

yingyinNormal.en: All right, I'm off to talk to my unborn child. Okay, Mom never hit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要去和还没出生的宝宝说话了。妈妈从不打我。

yingyinNormal.en: They hit us so hard. It's all right, baseball's our sport anyway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们深深地伤害了我。没关系啦，反正我们要打棒球了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah? What about that bike messenger you hit? Oh, I wasn't talking about his karma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 被你打的自行车快递员呢？我不是在说他的运气。

yingyinNormal.en: George is going to be the ball boy. He has to collect the ball when it is hit too far.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治要来当球童，当球被打到远处时，他要来捡球。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not gonna hit you. Why not? You'll feel better. I'll feel better. And you know you want to, I can see it in your eyes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会打你的。为什么不？你会比较好过，我也会比较好过。你知道，你想打我，我从你眼中看得出来。

yingyinNormal.en: She screamed. She hit him. Before he could even realize that he was bleeding, she was running, calling for help. But he ran after her. It was pitch black.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她尖叫着打他。当时他还没意识到他在流血，她逃走了，打电话求助。他去追她了。那里漆黑一片。

yingyinNormal.en: Get everybody off their phones. Hey, no phones. Get people off their computers. Don't hit send.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有人挂掉电话，别打电话，所有人停止使用电脑。别点击发送。

yingyinNormal.en: Mm, it's complicated. But as I remember it, the essentials are get chosen last, get hit by the ball, cry, go home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 规则很复杂的，不过在我看来，棒球的精髓就是最后才被选中，被球打，痛哭，回家。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I don't know what else to do. I said I'm sorry, now. Joey. Now you should scream at me or curse me or hit me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我不知道还能怎样，我已经道歉了，现在，现在你应该对我吼叫、咒骂，或是打我。

yingyinNormal.en: Look. It's simplicity itself. You just turn on the gas, hit the electric starter. Hit the electric starter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你看，很简单的，打开气阀，点火，点火。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm letting life hit me until it gets tired. And then I'm gonna hit back. It's a classic "Rope-a-dope". Okay, Ali. I love you. Unpack your boxes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让生活狠狠地打击我，直到它怂了。然后我就反击，这是经典的以逸待劳。行了，阿里，我爱你。快收拾你箱子。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 忽然意识到; 偶遇到

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 猛打；猛击；使受损失；使痛苦；击中；击；电影；音乐；有效；杀死

sense_info_list.en: to reach a particular level

examination_example.sentence: There is another problem: people became immensely inventive in <highlight>hitting</highlight> targets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有另一个问题：人们在达到目标方面变得非常有创造力。

examination_example.sentence: With the global population predicted to <highlight>hit</highlight> close to 10 billion by 2050, food security is increasingly making headlines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据预测，到2050年，全球人口将达到近100亿，粮食安全日益成为头条新闻。

examination_example.sentence: As many people <highlight>hit</highlight> middle age, they often start to notice that their memory and mental clarity are not what they used to be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着许多人步入中年，他们往往开始注意到自己的记忆力和思维清晰度不如从前。

sense_info_list.en: strike or be struck by someone or something forcefully

examination_example.sentence: With or without a club or racket, swing like you're <highlight>hitting</highlight> the ball.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论有没有球杆或球拍，都要像击球一样挥拍。

examination_example.sentence: But they also <highlight>hit</highlight> cyclists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是他们也会撞到骑自行车的人。

examination_example.sentence: Pairs of opponents <highlight>hit</highlight> the ball back and forth until one winner emerges from all who entered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一组组选手来回击球，直到所有参赛者中出现一名获胜者。

sense_info_list.en: affect or be affected by in a harmful or damaging way

examination_example.sentence: Without question, manufacturing has taken a significant <highlight>hit</highlight> during recent decades, and further trade deals raise questions about whether new shocks could <highlight>hit</highlight> manufacturing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，近几十年来，制造业遭受了重大打击，进一步的贸易协议引发了新的冲击是否会打击制造业的问题。

examination_example.sentence: The sharp <highlight>hit</highlight> to growth predicted around the world and in the UK could lead to a decline in the everyday services.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 预计全球和英国的（经济）增长将受到重击，这可能导致日常服务质量的下降。

sense_info_list.en: to become widely available

examination_example.sentence: Gen Zs are about to <highlight>hit</highlight> the streets looking for work in a labor market that's tighter than it's been in decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Z世代即将大量涌入社会找工作，而所处的劳动力市场比几十年前更紧缩。

sense_info_list.en: shoot at or bomb a place or person, causing damage or injury
discover or meet especially by chance
sense_info_list.zh: 忽然意识到; 偶遇到

sense_info_list.en: arrive at a place or position
succeed in reaching or achieving something
a thing or person that is very popular or successful

word_usage.usage:
表示“击打”时：
hit指有目标地猛击，强调用力击中；引申指在精神、经济等方面予以打击。
strike指迅速或突然地用力一击或敲击，可以是有意的，也可以是无意的。
beat指用手或器械连续击打，也指在游戏、竞赛或战争中战胜对手。
knock指用拳头或器械猛敲、猛打，强调非常用力。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“打，击中”侧重“击中”的意思，有时可以指打一下。
意为“击打”，泛指所有“打”的动作。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 忽然意识到; 偶然遇到

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: arrive at a place or position

examination_example.sentence: Richemont <highlight>hit</highlight> the headlines in May for taking back £437 million of watches for destruction in the last two years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 历峰在5月份因收回过去两年中销毁的4.37亿只手表而成为头条新闻。

examination_example.sentence: Under Christopher Bailey as creative director they turned the brand around and this past year revenue <highlight>hit</highlight> £2.73 billion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在创意总监克里斯托弗·贝利(Christopher Bailey)的带领下，他们扭转了品牌，去年的收入达到27.3亿英镑。

sense_info_list.en: strike or be struck by someone or something forcefully
affect or be affected by in a harmful or damaging way
discover or meet especially by chance
sense_info_list.zh: 忽然意识到; 偶然遇到

sense_info_list.en: a thing or person that is very popular or successful

word_usage.usage: hit的过去式、过去分词都是hit。

hit sb. on/in 表示“击、打”身体某部位。
The ball hit him in the eye.
球打在他的眼睛上。
The ball hit him on the nose.
球击中了他的鼻子。

hit作名词，可指风行一时的人或物。
His novel was a great hit.
他的小说很受欢迎。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词, 含义广泛, 指用手或器械连续打击。也指在游戏、竞赛或战争中作打败对手。
普通用词, 常与 strike 换用, 侧重有目标的猛击, 强调用力击中; 引申指在精神、经济等方面予以打击。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 忽然意识到; 偶然遇到
产生不良影响;打击;危害

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: strike or be struck by someone or something forcefully

examination_example.sentence: His car <highlight>hit</highlight> a sign and was badly damaged.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的车撞到一个标杆，损坏得很严重。

examination_example.sentence: A truck carrying the sweet load <highlight>hit</highlight> a road barrier and overturned, blocking two lanes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一辆装载甜料的卡车撞上路障，翻倒，堵塞了两条车道。

examination_example.sentence: A truck <highlight>hit</highlight> a barrier and overturned.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一辆卡车撞上障碍物翻倒了。

sense_info_list.en: affect or be affected by in a harmful or damaging way
discover or meet especially by chance
sense_info_list.zh: 忽然意识到; 偶然遇到

examination_example.sentence: So executives at Aladdin <highlight>hit</highlight> on an idea that would harness the newfound popularity of television.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，阿拉丁的高管们想出了一个主意，利用广受欢迎的电视新获得的人气。

examination_example.sentence: That bulky container served me well through my first and second grades, until the live-action version of 101 Dalmatians <highlight>hit</highlight> theaters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我读一年级和二年级时，那个笨重的容器一直为我服务，直到《101忠狗》的真人版上映。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>hits</highlight> him: This crowd isn't made up of tourists. They're Venetians.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他突然意识到：这群人并不是由游客组成的。他们是威尼斯人。

sense_info_list.en: a thing or person that is very popular or successful

examination_example.sentence: Companies are so desperate for a <highlight>hit</highlight> of stars that if you delete the survey the company sends you another one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公司非常渴望一批受欢迎的明星，以至于如果你删除了调查，公司会再给你发一份。

sense_info_list.en: to have a bad effect on somebody/something
sense_info_list.zh: 产生不良影响;打击;危害

examination_example.sentence: The bushfires that <highlight>hit</highlight> the area back then destroyed a large part of her family's massive property.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当时袭击该地区的森林大火摧毁了她家大量财产的很大一部分。

sense_info_list.en: shoot at or bomb a place or person; causing damage or injury
arrive at a place or position

word_usage.usage:
hit sb. on/in 表示“击、打”身体某部位。
The ball hit him in the eye.
球打在他的眼睛上。
The ball hit him on the nose.
球击中了他的鼻子。
hit的过去式、过去分词都是hit。

hit作名词，可指风行一时的人或物。
His novel was a great hit.
他的小说很受欢迎。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 普通用词，含义广泛，指用手或器械连续打击。也指在游戏、竞赛或战争中作打败对手。
普通用词，常与 strike 换用，侧重有目标的猛击，强调用力击中; 引申指在精神、经济等方面予以打击。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A flood had <highlight>hit</highlight> the area earlier that year and the damage it caused had driven away a number of birds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那年早些时候，一场洪水袭击了该地区，造成的损失赶走了许多鸟类。

examination_example.sentence: We yelled at the bear, <highlight>hit</highlight> pots hard, and fired blank shotgun shells into the air.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们对着熊大喊，用力砸罐子，并向空中发射空猎枪子弹。

examination_example.sentence: Suddenly a football fell just in front of me and almost <highlight>hit</highlight> me.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然一个足球正好落在我面前，差点砸到我。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>hit</highlight> me that every kit we were to build that day would eventually be in the hands of an Iraqi child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我突然想到，那天我们要制作的每一件装备最终都会到一个伊拉克孩子的手里。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (hit the road)开始; 出发; 上路
(hit it off)一见如故; 投缘
忽然意识到; 偶然遇到

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 猛打；猛击；使受损失；使痛苦；击中；击；电影；音乐；有效；杀死

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 着地；撞击地面；[美国俚语]倒塌

sense_info_list.en: strike or be struck by someone or something forcefully

examination_example.sentence: The football <highlight>hit</highlight> the cat heavily and it made a loud sound.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 足球重重地打在猫的身上，发出一声巨响。

examination_example.sentence: It <highlight>hit</highlight> a tower at the power station before the first flash of lightning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它在第一道闪电前击中了发电站的一座塔。

examination_example.sentence: One of them nearly <highlight>hit</highlight> my head.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其中一个差点撞到我的头。

examination_example.sentence: Which area has been <highlight>hit</highlight> by Ebola seriously?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 哪一个地区受到了埃博拉的严重袭击？

examination_example.sentence: The TV show contestant wanted to offer help after hurricanes(飓风) <highlight>hit</highlight> the country last September.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在去年9月飓风袭击该国后，这位电视节目选手想给予帮助。

examination_example.sentence: Frank said he had been living in New York before a heavy rainstorm <highlight>hit</highlight> the city in the autumn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 弗兰克说，在秋天的一场暴雨袭击纽约之前，他一直住在纽约。

sense_info_list.zh: (hit the road)开始; 出发; 上路

examination_example.sentence: You can say, "Hey, I need to <highlight>hit</highlight> the road. Can we talk about this another time?"
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以说，“嘿，我要上路了。我们能改天再谈这个吗？”

examination_example.sentence: Let's <highlight>hit</highlight> the road to learn some and try to use them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让我们上路学习一些，并尝试使用它们。

examination_example.sentence: Or simply, "It's time to <highlight>hit</highlight> the road."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 或者简单地说，“是时候上路了。”

examination_example.sentence: You can learn a lot when you <highlight>hit</highlight> the books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你用功读书的时候，你可以学到很多东西。

examination_example.sentence: Do you enjoy <highlight>hitting</highlight> the books?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你喜欢用功看书吗？

examination_example.sentence: Especially before exams, most students spend a lot of time <highlight>hitting</highlight> the books to get good grades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尤其是在考试之前，大多数学生花大量的时间去用功读书，以获得好成绩。

sense_info_list.en: arrive at a place or position

examination_example.sentence: Then Galileo came along, dropped two balls from a high tower, and discovered that they <highlight>hit</highlight> the ground at the same time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后伽利略过来，从高塔上扔下两个球，发现它们同时落到了地上！

examination_example.sentence: According to the data from the WMO, temperatures on the Antarctica (南极洲) just <highlight>hit</highlight> 18.3℃.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据世界气象组织的数据，南极洲的温度刚刚达到18.3℃。

examination_example.sentence: The temperatures on the Antarctica <highlight>hit</highlight> the highest in March, 2015.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 南极洲的温度在2015年3月达到最高。

sense_info_list.zh: (hit it off)一见如故; 投缘

examination_example.sentence: My mentor and I <highlight>hit</highlight> it off right away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我和导师一见如故。

sense_info_list.en: discover or meet especially by chance
sense_info_list.zh: 忽然意识到; 偶然遇到

examination_example.sentence: It finally <highlight>hit</highlight> me: She was gone forever.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我终于意识到：她永远地离开了。

word_usage.usage: hit的过去式、过去分词都是hit。

hit sb. on/in 表示“击、打”身体某部位。
The ball hit him in the eye.
球打在他的眼睛上。
The ball hit him on the nose.
球击中了他的鼻子。

hit作名词，可指风行一时的人或物。
His novel was a great hit.
他的小说很受欢迎。
